Name: Fruit Juice
About the game: Fruit Juice - a game close to the genre 3 in a row, made in 2D hand-drawn graphics. In it you have to complete tasks, collecting the longest chains from various fruits or think over moves in advance to make the chain even longer. The game offers many levels, pleasant visual style, sticky and stress-free gameplay, as well as pleasant musical accompaniment.
